original_title: 熟女肉感キング 風船クラブ原作 勃起する母、濡れる息子 「ム・レ・マ・マ」＆「熟恋」の2作品を完全収録！！ 村上涼子 当真ゆき 七瀬ゆい
overview: That balloon club is finally here! Ryoko Murakami, a plump queen, enthusiastically performs two works, "Mure Ma Ma" and "Juku Koi", which are included in the popular original comics published by Chloe! !! From the characters to the production and frame splitting, the live-action film is as faithful as possible! Faithful and Eloy enough to make you laugh! You can enjoy two works that burst with a powerful plump body, a nasty story, a situation that comes with muramura and a balloon club world! A masterpiece that is even more interesting than the original! !!
title: Mature Woman Pleasure King! Kurabu Fusen Original Work – Throbbing Mothers, Dripping Sons – “Group Fuck Mamas” & “Deep Love” Both Perfectly Captured! Ryoko Murakami Yuki Toma Yui Nanase
